mapper.insert: insert into Walk(peid, w_img, w_distance, w_time, w_date, w_flag, w_like) values(#{peid}, #{w_img}, #{w_distance}, #{w_time}, now(), 0, #{w_like});
insert into Place(p_latitude, p_longtitude, p_like, p_hate, w_flag) values(#{p_latitude}, #{p_longtitude}, 0, 0, 0);
insert into Likeplace(pid, peid, isLike, lp_flag) values(#{pid}, #{peid}, #{isLike}, 0);
